data.actual_result: You get left at discordapp . com / developers, which is a blank screen
data.expected_result: You get redirected to discordapp . com / developers/applications
data.short_description: [iOS WEBSITE BUG] Discord Developer Portal Redirect after login is broken
data.steps_to_repro: - log out of discord on mobile browser- go to discordapp . com- click "developer portal" on the dropdown menu- sign in
